creator: carla.schaffner@netcetera.ch
text:
ERROR-DESCRIPTION:
the doclet xml tag does not allow param as subcomponents (see below).


JAVADOC-TASK-DEFINITION:

    <javadoc sourcepath="../../../nca-110-5/scr/juice/scr" destdir="${outdir}" 
packagenames="ch.netcetera.juice">
      <doclet name="com.mf.doclet.DocBookDoclet" 
path="${docletversion}/classes"/>
        <param name="-properties" value="dbdocletJuice.properties"/>
      </doclet>
    </javadoc>


OUTPUT:

BUILD FAILED

/share/3/home/cschaff/projects/nca-135-1/jakarta-ant/test/build.xml:38: The 
<javadoc2> task doesn't support the nested "param" element.

You closed the doclet tag with a / here
<doclet name="com.mf.doclet.DocBookDoclet" path="${docletversion}/classes"/>

So Ant thinks you are passing the <param> element directly to <javadoc> which as
the error message says, it does not support.

Try replacing the above with
<doclet name="com.mf.doclet.DocBookDoclet" path="${docletversion}/classes">
creator: conor@apache.org
